title: Patch warning
body:
Ok{{champion:33}} , what I'm thinking is that Riot should tell us when the next patch is coming. I don't really know when it is coming so if anyone has a website or something that shows when thee next few patches are coming, can you plz show me :). This is because I dont get a chance to play league b4 school and I only get a short time to have play after school. If i knew when the patches where, then i could leave lol open.
Also we really should be able to postpone patches for like a week {{summoner:3}} . This way we could patch when we had time. Thx 4 any help/comment
PS. Sorry 4 any grammar, spelling mistakes
{{champion:86}} , {{champion:161}} , {{champion:154}}

replies.body: Generally, there is an announcement made on the boards a day prior to any scheduled maintenance, including patches. As Lord Sesshomaru said, patches are usually released every second Wednesday and, if they're not, there might be an announcement on the boards explaining why (and it usually is just delayed by a day or two in that case).

Every second wednesday usually, with the next patch due this coming wednesday, (however because of worlds I'm not sure what the deal is atm)

the problem with postponing matches is that what if you postpone your patch and play with someone who has patched and is playing a new champion? your patch doesn't have the champion or its abilities coded into it so some shit would go down.
Patches still occur, just don't expect any massive changes. 5.18 is the patch worlds will be played on however.

Oh yeah, didnt think of the second part. Thanks for the wednesday advice. Im just annoyed because my LOL got patched, asked ffor another patch - the same one, then deleted itself. Its getting annoying waiting for the patches
